mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Bushrod Washington and Lawrence Lewis to George Fayette Washington, 1823 January 3
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Bushrod, 1762-1829
Lewis, Lawrence,1767-1839
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed circular letter requesting agreement of legatees of George Washington's estate to bring suit in court of District of Columbia in order to settle & pay out remaining assets of estate -- signed by Bushrod Washington and Lawrence Lewis -- a note is added in Bushrod Washington's hand, requesting to know heirs of Mrs. Anna Maria Thornton [Geo. F. Washington's sister] -- this added note is dated 23 January 1823. Letter signed, printed, 2 pages includes additions in hand of Bush. W., integral cover in hand of B.W., laminated, watermark (crown over powder horn & C&I Honig; IV).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Thornton, Anna Maria Washington, 1788-1816
